geo-zones.description: Serve polygon overlays, compliance gates, and analytics to all production personas.

booking-orchestrator.description: Gradually roll out orchestrator enhancements to partner cohorts with SLA monitoring.

rental-marketplace.description: Hold rental listings until compliance evidence and insured seller review complete.

communications-suite.description: Limit AI assisted chat and Agora sessions to support-managed tenants pending trust scoring.

analytics-dashboards.description: Expose telemetry dashboard, export tooling, and diagnostics for exec and ops teams.
